GSR - GUI-mode Search and Replace

Parameters:
Search Expression - search pattern ("^\\s*$"). See QRegExp for details on constructing a regular expression.
Replace With - replace string. The string that replaces the matched text in the file. Default: "".
Starting Path - the starting directory (C:/Qt/examples). Default: current directory.
File Types - the types of text files to be searched ("*.cpp *.h"). Default: all files.
Include Subdirs - if checked, search includes all files in all the subdirectories of the Starting Path directory.
Search Only - if checked, no matching strings are replaced with the replace string. A list of the files that contain matching strings are shown in the console window.
Notes:
  1. Clear. Selecting the clear button clears the contents of the console window.
  2. Run. Start the search/replace operation. A non-empty search pattern is required.
  3. Help. Brings up the doxygen help.
  4. Quit. The application is closed.
  5. Replace defaults to an empty string, in which case the matched strings are deleted (unless Search Only is checked).
  6. Starting Path defaults to the current working directory. The path may be relative or absolute.
  7. File Types defaults to all files *.*. Include only text files such as *.txt, *.log, *.html, *.ini, *.h, *.c, *.cpp, etc.
  8. Generated messages are shown in the console text window.
